detail_desc: Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a small imitation leather appliqué on the chest. Wrapover, jersey-lined funnel collar with a drawstring, a kangaroo pocket, long sleeves with contrasting colour side stripes, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit liner socks designed to be hidden inside your shoes. The socks have a ribbed section in the middle of the foot and elastication around the openings for optimum comfort.
Scarf in a soft weave with a brushed finish. Fringes on the short sides.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Large clip earrings with studs, plastic stone pendants and brass D-rings. Length approx. 8 cm.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a woven wool blend with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and zip fly. Side pockets and gently tapered legs with creases.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with a small V-neck at the back of the neck and buttons at the back. Gathered seam at the waist and a decorative bow at the front. Unlined.
Long metal earrings with pompoms and tassels. Length 13 cm.
Imitation leather trainers with a padded edge, loop at the back, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front. Mesh linings and insoles.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.
Mules with scallop-edged straps. Leather linings and insoles and smooth ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Short dress in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and lined drawstring hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, slits in the sides and ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Cotton jersey hipster briefs with covered elastication and a lined gusset.

Outdoor jacket with a lightly padded front in fast-drying, breathable, functional fabric. Drawstring hood, high collar, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Regular Fit. Partly lined.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Bohemian blouse in a soft cotton weave with elastication and a broderie anglaise flounce at the top.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit with a tie belt and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Narrow imitation leather belts in different designs with a metal buckle. Width 1.2 cm.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket with a button, and a gently rounded hem.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Small frill trim around the neckline, a yoke, and a V-shaped opening with ties at the front. Gently dropped shoulders and short balloon sleeves with concealed elastication at the hems. Straight cut at the top relaxing into a flared skirt with a seam that has a small frill trim and a scalloped hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with wide ribbing around the neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Striped T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Fabric cap with elastication at the back.
Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave in a narrow cut with gathers at the top and short, narrow shoulder straps. Lace trim around the armholes.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket.
Jumper in marled, double-knitted cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in soft cotton. Longer top in sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a ribbed hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and decorative bow at the hems.
Cardigan knitted in soft cotton with long sleeves and buttons down the front.
Hat in soft, rib-knit, warming cashmere with a wide turn-up at the hem.
Knee-length, pattern-weave skirt with a concealed zip at the back and decorative buttons.
Shortie briefs in microfibre and lace with a high waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and cutaway coverage at the back.

Body in mesh and lace with a push-up bra. Underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool, with a turtle neck and long sleeves with short slits at the cuffs.
Straight-cut dress in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck and small stand-up collar. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Short, wide, top in jersey with a shimmering metallic finish, with a round neck and short sleeves.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with quilted sections on the knees.
Shorts in an airy, patterned viscose weave with pleats at the front for added volume, elastication at the back of the waist, side pockets and wide legs.

Running jacket in textured, fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with reflective details. Stand-up collar, zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket and long sleeves with thumbholes and tape-trimmed cuffs. Gently rounded at the back.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with gathers around the neckline and an opening with ties at the back of the neck. Smocked seam under the bust and long raglan sleeves with wide smocking at the cuffs.
Short off-the-shoulder dress in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated top, 3/4-length sleeves with elasticated cuffs and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Dress in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a V-neck and long raglan sleeves. Double layer at the top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Shorts in a soft, fine-knit cashmere and cotton blend with wide, elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and raw, roll-edge hems.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.
Joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, an open back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a top in soft cotton jersey and a pair of pull-on trousers in woven fabric. Top with flutter sleeves and a print motif on the front. Trousers with an all-over print, covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.

Leggings in washed superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with hard-worn details with patches on the inside. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge, cut-off hems.

Short, sleeveless dress with a V-neck. Sewn-in wrapover at the front with a concealed press-stud at the top and a strap with D-rings at one side. Seam at the waist and a visible zip at the back. Lined.
Shorts in an airy viscose weave. High waist with wide, covered elastication at the back, pleats at the top, diagonal side pockets and wide legs.
Baby Exclusive. Vest top in a crinkled, organic cotton weave with a button placket and short slits in the sides.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Waist bag in a sturdy weave with an appliqué on the front, zip at the top and a zipped outer compartment. Adjustable waist belt with a plastic fastener. Size 3.5x12x19.5 cm.
Jeans in stretch, supersoft denim. Skinny fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Shirt in a stretch cotton weave with a classic button front, yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.

Shirt in organic Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Short dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a frill-trimmed opening at the back and button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip in one side, long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem. Double-layered bodice at the front and short jersey lining skirt.
Fitted coat in a soft, felted wool blend with notch lapels and concealed press-studs down the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist, pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Lined.
Trousers in washed cotton twill. Relaxed fit with concealed elastication and a button at the waist, zip fly, utility pockets at the front and fake back pockets with a flap.
Fitted T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.

Knee-length dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, pin-tucks at the top and short sleeves. Concealed fastening at the top and a seam at the waist with elastication at the back and a sewn-in tie belt. Satin lining. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Short, fitted dress in jersey with a sheen. Double layer and a deep V-neck at the front, a low-cut back, narrow shoulder straps and narrow strap across the front and back. Unlined.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and straight legs.
Short-sleeved dress in patterned cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a gathered skirt.
Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Easy-iron finish.
Fully lined bikini top with lightly padded cups, decorative straps at the front, wide shoulder straps for good support and a metal fastener at the back.
Fully-fashioned trainers with elastication around the opening, elasticated lacing at the front and a glittery loop at the back. Mesh insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Long, sleeveless dress in pleated jersey. Round neckline and an opening with a decorative bar-shaped metal bead at the back of the neck. Narrow elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a raw-edge hem.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, thin shoulder pads, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with a short slit at the cuffs. No fasteners. Lined.
Fine-knit T-shirt in slub cotton yarn with an open chest pocket with roll edge, seam centre back and roll edges around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Short, sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, small stand-up collar and flap chest pockets. Concealed buttons at the front, a drawstring at the waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons at the front and welt front pockets with a flap. Decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Striped cotton jersey top with a ribbed trim around the neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and short slits in the sides.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned, organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and short legs. Press-studs down the front and along one leg.

Parka in a sturdy weave with a drawstring hood with a fleece lining at the front. Zip and wind flap with a hook-and-loop fastening at the front, handwarmer pockets and patch pockets with a flap and hook-and-loop fastening. Adjustable tab with a hook-and-loop fastening at the cuffs and sides and a drawstring at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Lined bikini top with a wrapover front and back, wide elasticated hem and a metal fastener at the back.

Baby Exclusive. Narrow-striped romper suit in soft organic cotton slub jersey with buttons at the top and a chest pocket. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, concealed press-studs at the crotch and short legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, a pleat front and back for added width, and narrow ties under the bust. Unlined.
Imitation leather bag with shimmering metallic details. Two handles and a zip at the top. Lined. Size 10x13x19 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a high collar and zip at the top with a chin guard. Long raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Round-necked top in soft cotton jersey. Short, glittery tulle puff sleeves with narrow elastication.
